messages.subject: Attention Writers
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! I wanted to pop in something of a public service announcement for all your writers out there who are thinking of branching out into original fiction.
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

I wanted to pop in something of a public service announcement for all
your writers out there who are thinking of branching out into original
fiction. You can get a critique of your work and support a good cause by
checking out the "Fire Fund" auction currently being held on eBay to
help romance and young adult author Marianne Mancusi whose home was
destroyed by fire while she was out of town at a conference last month.

There are top agents and editors donating critiques and while those bids
are getting "way up there" you can get in a bid with other
multipublished, award winning authors (myself included) for bids
starting at $1.

Surely one of you has $1 to spare to salvage my pride (I have no bids
yet) and more importantly to help a worthy cause. The link to the
various auctions is below.


http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQfsooZ2QQfsopZ3QQsassZmariannefirefund.



--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/
